title: Shopping addiction should be taken more seriously say sufferers
description: People with experience of compulsive buying say more NHS help is needed to tackle the issue.
content:
A day of retail therapy can be just the ticket for some people to help them feel better about themselves. But what happens when you can't stop shopping?
Surrounded by racks of shirts, dresses and jumpers, Lucy tells me that she could spend up to 14 h... [1075 chars]

title: Israeli public figures call for ‘crippling sanctions’ on Israel over Gaza starvation
description: Thirty-one high-profile Israelis accuse Tel Aviv of ‘brutal campaign’ and demand permanent ceasefire in letter
content:
A group of high-profile Israeli public figures, including academics, artists and public intellectuals, has called for “crippling sanctions” to be imposed by the international community on Israel, amid mounting horror over its starvation of Gaza.

title: Powerful 8.8-magnitude earthquake causes tsunami in Russia's Far East - with warnings issued for Japan, Hawaii and Alaska
description: A powerful 8.8-magnitude earthquake has struck off Russia's far eastern Kamchatka Peninsula, causing a tsunami.
content:
A powerful 8.8-magnitude earthquake has struck off Russia's far eastern Kamchatka Peninsula, causing a tsunami.
A tsunami of up to four metres (13 feet) was recorded in Kamchatka Peninsula, leading to evacuations and damaging buildings, officials sai... [3002 chars]

title: Transgender row rape charity starts new service for biological women
description: The new group will run alongside an existing service which allows trans and non-binary people to take part
content:
